author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Acadia Healthcare Reports Q4 Same Store Sales Rose 6.6 Pct
text:
Feb 21 (Reuters) - Acadia Healthcare Company Inc:
* ACADIA HEALTHCARE REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER REVENUE OF $724.5 MILLION, EPS OF $0.80 AND ADJUSTED EPS OF $0.61
* Q4 REVENUE ROSE 3.1 PERCENT TO $724.5 MILLION * Q4 SAME STORE SALES ROSE 6.6 PERCENT * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.80 * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.47 TO $0.49 * SEES FY 2018 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $2.42 TO $2.48 * Q4 ADJUSTED EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.61 * SEES FY 2018 REVENUE $3.04 BILLION TO $3.08 BILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.54, REVENUE VIEW $710.8 MILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.49 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* FY2018 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $2.49, REVENUE VIEW $3.00 BILLION -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
